title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Be certain your words express exactly what you mean and repeat your message if you dont think someone gets it the first time. People might be afflicted with a fogginess of mind that foils communication today. Take charge without placing the blame on someone else, even if they deserve it. The opposition between exacting Mercury in your sign and ambiguous Neptune in Pisces requires you to put more effort toward understanding each others positions. Your undivided attention leads to smoother interactions and empowers you to feel inspired by your finesse. Talk is cheap but real connections are priceless. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
